package.name: HomeGesture.

dependencies.package: firmware (>= 11.0), mobilesubstrate, preferenceloader, com.creaturecoding.libcspreferences, com.creaturesurvive.libcscolorpicker, org.thebigboss.libcolorpicker, com.spark.libsparkapplist

package.shortDescription: Turn your device into an iPhone X.

descriptionlist.description: The tweak adds gestures from the iPhone X to older devices..
